profile:

 floor caring, or Janitorial  job. We are experienced in dealing with small and large projects and understand what it takes to deliver a quality service.

Whether youâ€™re a business owner with many responsibilities or a busy professional always on the run, AMC Atlantic commercial and residential facility services will keep your space in neat and tidy condition. Our team of experienced professionals strives to create a seamless client experience and get the job done with quality, speed, and professionalism.

If you need strip and wax treatment for your floor or a full paint job for our house, we can take on the project and complete it on schedule and in budget. 

When you work with AMC Atlantic Company, you are guaranteed high quality craftsmanship, strong attention to detail, and utmost professionalism. Get in touch with us today to start your facility services project.

profile:
Since 2014, we've been working to help make our clients' painting dreams come true. Whether it's a new colour for the kitchen or a fresh coat for the house, we're ready to help with any painting request. We specialize in painting, wallpaper, staining, cabinet refinishing, and even minor drywall repairs. Our customers are our top priority; we don't stop working until you're happy. 

If you're interested in getting some quality painting work done, feel free to give us a call anytime!
services: Painting, wallpaper, staining, cabinet refinishing, minor drywall repairs.
warranty_terms: 30% up front, 70% accepted when customer is satisfied
